amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding, by offset, for the 2005 Department of Defense Base Closure Account by $30 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce appropriation for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization Security Investment Program by $30,000,000, and increase the Department of Defense Base Closure Account by $30,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hayes amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 304 (Roll no. 492).
